name: canshare-tnm-gist-other-stage-group
title: NZ AJCC gastrointestinal stromal tumour small intestine and oesophageal and colon and rectum and mesenteric and peritoneal stage group
description: The stage groups that describe how far a gastrointestinal stromal tumour (GIST) small intestine and oesophageal and colon and rectum and mesenteric and peritoneal has grown and spread, using the AJCC cancer staging manual (latest edition).
